robertmothershead wrote:
> Hi Group!
>
> Meta-newbie here. Understand that Heritrix is not currently supported 
> on OS X, but have also
> seen some posts referencing that as a pure Java app it does and has 
> run on OS X.
>
> Does anyone have recent experience with this implementation?

Works for me.

>
> There seems to be a large learning curve associated with simply moving 
> from the install
> process for Linux, to an OS-X-compatible install. Any pointers, docs, 
> or other guidance you
> can provide?

I've been setting JAVA_HOME=/usr

St.Ack
